name: Shitty Cactus
description:
The grumpy cactus has done enough standing around!
At least it wan't to have a good view. Can you help the cactus?

Jump until you reach the stars! Or at least get closer to them.
Break the clouds and break the records, reach new heights!

If you can't go further or can't go fast enough, return and upgrade the cactus.
Jump heigher, run faster, find more clouds, coins and platforms.
And most of all... die less.
